name: .ODX File Extension
summary: Learn about .ODX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Business process orchestration diagram created with Microsoft BizTalk Server; used for creating a visual representation of executable business processes; can be exported by the user and imported by a developer as a starting point for implementing an orchestration.

content: ODX files can be validated using the Orchestration Checker tool, which checks for logic errors in the business process orchestration diagram.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
